attributes.action: train staff properly before implementing new technologies - the e - petitions and example below are prime cases where the margin for error is detrimentally affecting the service of govt. and public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just don't believe it !!! Lost data, poor editing and another IT worker who has received a whopping £31,500 bill after downloading his favourite TV show while abroad. The media age needs closer supervision. The petitioner is calling on the PM to kick the ass of irresponsible editors and encourage a review of ethical standards in journalism.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
